name: Escape from the Mansion
description:
Escape from the Mansion is a short adventure game taking place in a mansion.

The story began as the hero in the attempt to explore an old abandoned mansion near his home, he find himself trapped inside it. He must explore the mansion, find its secrets and finaly find a way to escape.
